Full controller support my ass. SURE you can use the controller, just have to go through all the menus and start the game first using the mouse  and you're ALL SET. Ok,  wait, plus you need to choose which side you're on and then you are good to go. Wait you want to buy weapons and stuff? ugh . Look I don't know what to tell you, you need the mouse again. Yes you can use the controller how many times do we have to tell you.

On second thought why don't you just use mouse and keyboard? It's far superior
